name: Flash Email Executive Leadership Team
description: Daily Flash link for internal communications

text.content:
Good morning,
 
In order to improve data security, accessibility, and speed Flash links below have been moved to a new server.
 
Here is your CTCA Daily Flash Report.  The Flash Report is intuitive tool to help proactively manage resource availability, which can be Providers, Equipment or Rooms.
 
To
 
drill down on a site click on its respective “Detailed Availability Tab” (It
 
takes several seconds to load on first click).
 
Links
 
below are not available on mobile devices or laptops that are not connected to
 
the internal network server via VPN for security reasons.
 
Flash Clinic:
https://mavtablapp001p/#/site/OE/views/RMS_Avail/RMCClinicProviderAvailability
 
Note: Nurse Practitioner(NP)  and Physician Assistant(PA) percentages are consolidated on summary page on one line.  Specialty and Provider Classes of are being aligned and validated on the details page to ensure accuracy across all sites.
 
These
 
are not yet completed (BETA versions) but we are including them so you can see
 
the structure and information contained.
 
Flash Reports in Progress
 
Flash Infusion:
https://mavtablapp001p/#/site/OE/views/Infusion/RMCInfusionNurseandBayAvailability
 
Flash RadOnc
https://mavtablapp001p/#/site/OE/views/RadOnc/RadOncProviderSummary
 
Flash Imaging / Surgery are not yet migrated to the new server.
 
Please contact us with any feedback and or questions.
 
Thanks,
 
Luc Collins
 
Operational Excellence  / Sr. Consultant, 
Comprehensive Care and Research Center,Phoenix 
676 137th Ave.  Goodyear, AZ 85338 
O:(623) 207-3273   C:(602) 620-2909 
E:luc.collins@ctca-hope.com mailto:luc.collins@ctca-hope.com 
W:cancercenter.com http://www.cancercenter.com/ 
Hospitals | https://www.cancercenter.com/locations?loc=hospitals 
Outpatient Care Centers https://www.cancercenter.com/locations?loc=clinics
 
The information contained in this
 
communication is confidential and does not apply to anyone other than the
 
intended recipient. If the reader of this communication is not the intended
 
recipient, you are hereby notified that any dissemination, distribution or
 
copying of this communication is strictly prohibited. If you have received
 
this communication in error, please notify me immediately by reply e-mail or
 
telephone and destroy all copies of the original message.
 
%%profile_center_url%%
 
This email was sent by:
